channel.title: Year in Review on Chris Muthig
channel.description: Recent content in Year in Review on Chris Muthig

item.title: 2019 Year In Review
item.description: My 2019 is best described as focusing on soft skills and taking on new roles in my career. I was able to work on a number of exciting projects as well, but those were natural progressions from projects I worked on previously, whereas so much of the soft skills were brand new, challenging experiences. Remote Work For the first time in my career, I spent 2019 working 100% remotely. This was first from Australia from January to May, and then from California for the remainder of the year.
